posts._title: Géla Babluani & Temur Babluani – L’Héritage AKA Legacy (2006)
posts.title: L’Héritage
posts.excerpt: Quote: “Three French hipsters and their translator travel through rural Georgia to claim a remote, ruined castle that one of them has inherited. En route, they encounter an old man and his grandchild who are on a journey to carry out a mysterious, morbid ritual designed to end a conflict between warring clans.”

posts._title: Harry Watt & Basil Wright – Night Mail (1936)
posts.title: Night Mail
posts.excerpt: SYNOPSIS Made in 1936 NIGHTMAIL has become an icon of the British documentary movement. The budget was only £2,000 and the film was made as a promotional film for the Post Office services. The GPO film unit deserves a posthumous Oscar. The quality of directing, lighting and camera work in this documentary beats that of …

posts.title: Favula

posts._title: Oksana Bychkova – Eshche odin god AKA Another Year (2014)
posts.title: Eshche odin god
posts.excerpt: A young married couple in today’s Moscow: He’s an unemployed guy who gets some money by giving rides to strangers at nights (the illegal taxi driving so common in Russia). She’s a young graphic designer who just got her first job. The film tracks their unstable relationship throughout a year. Both have different backgrounds and …

posts.title: Echo Chamber
posts.excerpt: A radio, a warning repeated in a loop, intuition of a catastrophe that slowly approaches through the ruins and houses of a tropical rainforest. A natural disaster is coming, a natural disaster is coming, a natural disaster is coming… The paradox and its danger are served: a warning endlessly repeated may become a strange peace …

posts.title: X Femmes (Various)
posts.excerpt: X Femmes (English: X Women) is a French television series of short films shown on Canal+ in 2008–2009. They were shot by female directors with the goal of producing erotica and soft-core pornography from a female point of view. Episodes Season 1 – Original air date 25 October 2008 1. posts.title: Che?
